game.name: Barge
game.shortDescription: Grow crops, raise animals, and harvest resources that you can sell in towns you pass as you and your barge float down an endless river in this top down, pixel art, farming sim.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Grow crops, raise animals, and harvest resources that you can sell in towns you pass as you and your barge float down an endless river in this top down, pixel art, farming sim.
